Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Washington in 2010...
Traded from Washington to San Diego on 4/1/2010 (Going to WSH: CF C. Ross. Going to SDN: C Y. Grandal)...
Traded from San Diego to Houston on 7/28/2010 (Going to SDN: C V. Martinez. Going to HOU: C Y. Grandal, P C. Volstad)...
Traded from Houston to Detroit on 6/16/2011 (Going to DET: 3B T. Goeddel, C Y. Grandal. Going to HOU: P J. Gobble)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Pat Misch (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2014, off Scott Diamond (CLE)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Milwaukee on 6/6/2014...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (N) on 6/1/2018...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Boston on 6/11/2018...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 6/27/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/24/2019 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (A) on 5/14/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/17/2021, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Cleveland on 8/10/2021...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 8/15/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/16/2021, hitting .563 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Toronto on 5/1/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 8/23/2022...
